thread.title: Win Rugby World Cup 2015 tickets and tours with MasterCard
thread.title_full: Win Rugby World Cup 2015 tickets and tours with MasterCard - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win Rugby World Cup 2015 tickets and tours with MasterCard
text: As a Worldwide Partner of Rugby World Cup 2015, MasterCard is offering Telegraph readers the chance to win tickets and tours to Rugby World Cup 2015. These fantastic prizes include: • One winner: two tickets to Wales v Fiji at the Millennium Stadium on October 1, 2015 at 4.45pm. • Two winners: each winner will receive two tickets to South Africa v Scotland at St James’ Park on October 3, 2015 at 4.45pm. Each winner will also have the option of a tour of the Millennium Stadium for two on October 2, 2015. • One winner: two tickets to England v Australia at Twickenham on October 3, 2015 at 8pm. The winner will also receive the match ball from this match. • Two winners: each winner will receive two tickets to Ireland v Italy at the Olympic Stadium on October 4, 2015 at 4.45pm. Each winner will also have the option of an Olympic Stadium tour for two on October 3, 2015. To enter this fantastic prize draw, complete the form below before noon on Friday, 25 September 2015: Online Form - Win Rugby World Cup 2015 tickets and tours with MasterCard telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
